**10/04/2017**

Single Flavor Test: **3.25%**
60/40 | 0 Nic | 40W | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton

 


‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 Hour Steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢ Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste

-- Aroma Intensity - Strong Artificial Hard Candy SB / Dessert SB Glaze 

-- Med. Sweetness | Flavor Intensity (Mod) | Not Tart or Sour
__________________________________________________
**10/11/017 (1 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Aroma Intensity - Strong | Hard Candy or "Glaze" SB + touch of Ripe SB


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Heavy Sweetness ( Candy "Glaze" SB - Dominant | "Ripe SB" - Faint/Submissive) 


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Mod/Strong Flavor Intensity | Med. Sweetness | Candy SB = Dominant w/ Light Realistic SB on End = Submissive | Light Sharpness & Tartness

----- Light / Watery "Juicy" Body | Clean Light Mouth Feel

 


‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None | No Floral

üìñ Contrast: Red Touch (FA), SB Ripe (Cap), SB (SC -RF) /// JF SBerry = Candy like
__________________________________________________
**10/18/2017 (2  Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Overall Unchanged

----- Aroma Intensity - Strong | Artificial SB - Hard Candy* | Hint of Ripe SB = Gone 


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Heavy Sweetness | Artificial SB Candy* / SB Corn Syrup


‚Ä¢ **Vape:**  ‚Üë in Flavor Intensity = Strong | ‚Üë in Sweetness = Sweet | Full* Artificial SBerry Hard Candy = "Sugar, High Fructose Corn Syrup with Artificial Flavoring"

-----  Light "Juicy" Body | Clean Mouth Feel

 


‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None

üìå Flavor Description Accuracy(@ 2 wks) = 2 of 5  "...juicy and ripe strawberry."
_________________________________________________
**10/25/2017 ( 3 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

----  Aroma Intensity - Strong | Fragrant & Sugary Candy-like Artificial Strawberry


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

----  Heavy Sweetness | Clean |  Candy-Like Strawberry / Artificial Strawberry Glaze "Corn Syrup" 


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Overall Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

---- Flavor Intensity - Strong | Sweet | Full Candy-Like Full* Artificial Strawberry or Strawberry Glaze = "Sugar, High Fructose Corn Syrup with Artificial Flavoring"

---- Medium, Smooth, Syrupy Body | Clean Med. Mouth Feel

 


‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None

‚Ä¢ FLV Description: "a juicy and ripe strawberry" - N/A |  SB Harvest = Artificial SB üç¨
